name: Prasad
wishText: Sorry bhai mene bohot try kiya wo cap tere sar ke upar lane ki but wo mere se ho nahi payi 🥲🥲
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Let's wish apan jaldi se mile 🥹. Aur wo apna December & Januray wala plan successful ho...🤞🏻🤞🏻
Aur wo apna December & Januray wala plan successful ho...🤞🏻🤞🏻
replayText: Sonu aur Bunny 🫂🫂 Sabki gaand faad denge
